description: HomePilot Model Catalog - Curated models for all providers
_comment: 🧪 EXPERIMENTAL: Add Civitai models using scripts/download.py --add-civitai --version-id <ID> --type <image|video>

chat.label: Llama 3 8B
chat.description: Fast, efficient 8B parameter model. Great for general-purpose tasks.

chat.label: Llama 3 70B
chat.description: High-quality 70B parameter model. Excellent reasoning and coding.

chat.label: Llama 3.1 (8B)
chat.description: Fast general-purpose chat model. Standard smart assistant baseline.

chat.label: Llama 3.1 70B
chat.description: Latest 70B model with 128K context window.

chat.label: Llama 3.2 (3B)
chat.description: Very fast, lightweight model for low-latency voice.

chat.label: Mistral 7B
chat.description: Efficient 7B model from Mistral AI.

chat.label: Mistral Nemo (12B)
chat.description: Balanced quality; good instruction following. Best 'Smart' model for 12GB.

chat.label: Mixtral 8x7B
chat.description: Mixture of Experts model with excellent performance.

chat.label: Qwen 2.5 (7B)
chat.description: Fast and capable general model with strong multilingual support.

chat.label: Gemma 2 (9B)
chat.description: Strong for writing, creative prose and tone.

chat.label: Phi-3 3.8B
chat.description: Microsoft's compact model with strong reasoning.

chat.label: Phi-4 (14B)
chat.description: Logic-heavy model from Microsoft; may be slower in voice.

chat.label: DeepSeek R1 (7B)
chat.description: Thinking model with chain-of-thought reasoning. Needs 300 tokens for voice.

chat.label: Dolphin 3.0 (8B)
chat.description: Latest Dolphin on Llama 3.1. Uncensored, coding, math, function calling.

chat.label: Dolphin Llama 3 (8B)
chat.description: Dolphin 2.9 based on Llama 3. Uncensored chat & coding.

chat.label: Dolphin Mistral (7B)
chat.description: Fast uncensored Dolphin on Mistral 2.8. Reliable for voice.

chat.label: Dolphin Mixtral (8x7B MoE)
chat.description: Powerful MoE for coding. Needs ~26GB RAM but fits 12GB VRAM.

chat.label: Hermes 3 (8B)
chat.description: Best for roleplay & creative writing. Coherent long-form outputs.

chat.label: Solar (10.7B)
chat.description: Good mid-sized uncensored chat model. Test latency for voice.

chat.label: WizardLM2 (7B)
chat.description: Solid uncensored chat model. Validate voice pacing.

chat.label: Llama 2 Uncensored (7B)
chat.description: Original uncensored Llama 2. Lightweight & fast.

chat.label: WizardLM Uncensored (13B)
chat.description: Eric Hartford's WizardLM uncensored. Good for chat.

chat.label: Wizard Vicuna Uncensored (7B)
chat.description: Hartford classic. Great for natural conversations.

chat.label: Llama 3.1 Abliterated (8B)
chat.description: Llama 3.1 with safety brakes removed via abliteration.

chat.label: Dolphin 2.9 Llama 3 (8B)
chat.description: Dolphin 2.9 on Llama 3 by Mannix.

chat.label: Qwen3 Abliterated
chat.description: Qwen3 abliterated. Highly recommended for uncensored use.

chat.label: Qwen3 Abliterated (8B)
chat.description: 8B version. Best balance of speed and quality.

chat.label: Qwen3 Abliterated (4B)
chat.description: 4B version. Super fast for voice applications.

chat.label: Qwen3 Coder Abliterated
chat.description: Best uncensored coder. Abliterated Qwen3 for code.

chat.label: Qwen3-Next Abliterated
chat.description: Latest Qwen3-Next with abliteration.

chat.label: Dolphin 3 Abliterated (8B)
chat.description: Dolphin 3.0 + abliteration = Maximum compliance.

chat.label: Huihui MoE Abliterated
chat.description: MoE architecture for efficient inference. Abliterated.

chat.label: GPT-OSS Abliterated
chat.description: OpenAI's GPT-OSS abliterated (experimental).

chat.label: JOSIEFIED Qwen3
chat.description: BEST OVERALL. 10/10 UGI Adherence. Abliterated + fine-tuned.

chat.label: JOSIEFIED Qwen3 (8B)
chat.description: #1 Pick. Best coherence + uncensored for 12GB VRAM.

chat.label: JOSIEFIED Qwen2.5
chat.description: Qwen2.5 JOSIEFIED. Abliterated + fine-tuned for coherence.

chat.label: JOSIEFIED Qwen2.5 (7B)

chat.label: JOSIEFIED Qwen2.5 (14B)

chat.label: JOSIEFIED Qwen2.5 (3B)

chat.label: Qwen3 Vision Abliterated (8B)

chat.label: Yarn Mistral (7B)
chat.description: Extended context uncensored Mistral variant.

chat.label: OpenHermes (7B)
chat.description: Uncensored Hermes variant. Good general chat.

chat.label: Neural Chat (7B)
chat.description: Intel's uncensored chat model. Good conversational flow.

chat.label: Llama 3.2 Abliterated (3B)
chat.description: Fast 3B Llama abliterated. Ultra-lightweight for voice.

chat.label: Gemma 3 Abliterated
chat.description: Google Gemma 3 with abliteration. Good writing quality.

chat.label: DeepSeek R1 Abliterated (8B)
chat.description: DeepSeek R1 thinking + uncensored. Chain-of-thought without filters.

chat.label: DeepSeek R1 Abliterated (14B)
chat.description: Larger DeepSeek R1 abliterated. Better reasoning, needs more VRAM.

chat.description: Tiny fast DeepSeek R1 abliterated. Minimal VRAM.

chat.label: Dolphin Coder (7B)
chat.description: Uncensored coding model based on CodeLlama. No content filters on code.

chat.label: JOSIEFIED Llama
chat.description: JOSIEFIED Llama series. Abliterated + fine-tuned for coherence.

chat.label: Samantha Mistral (7B)
chat.description: Uncensored companion model. Warm, conversational personality.

image.label: SDXL Base 1.0
image.description: Stable Diffusion XL base model. Best balance of quality and speed.

image.label: Flux.1 Schnell
image.description: Fast Flux model optimized for speed. 4-step generation. Note: Requires additional files (CLIP, VAE).

image.label: Flux.1 Dev
image.description: High-quality Flux model for detailed generations. Note: Requires additional files (CLIP, VAE).

image.label: Pony Diffusion v6 XL
image.description: SDXL-based model fine-tuned for anime/illustration. Uncensored, supports NSFW content.

image.label: Stable Diffusion 1.5
image.description: Classic SD 1.5 model. Fast, lightweight.

image.label: Realistic Vision v5.1
image.description: Photorealistic SD 1.5 model.

image.label: DreamShaper 8
image.description: Versatile model for artistic and realistic styles. Uncensored, excellent for NSFW content.

image.label: Deliberate v3
image.description: High-quality photorealistic model. Uncensored, great for adult content generation.

image.label: epiCRealism Pure Evolution
image.description: Ultra-realistic model for photorealistic generations. Fully uncensored for adult content.

image.label: CyberRealistic v4.2
image.description: Photorealistic model optimized for portraits and figures. Uncensored NSFW support.

image.label: AbsoluteReality v1.8.1
image.description: Highly realistic model for lifelike images. Full NSFW capability.

image.label: aZovya RPG Artist v5
image.description: Fantasy/RPG style artwork model. Supports uncensored adult content.

image.label: Unstable Diffusion
image.description: Community model trained without content restrictions. Designed for adult content.

image.label: MajicMix Realistic v7
image.description: Asian-focused photorealistic model. Uncensored for NSFW generations.

image.label: BBMix v4
image.description: Versatile model for realistic and semi-realistic styles. Full NSFW support.

image.label: Realisian v5.0
image.description: Photorealistic model with excellent skin textures. Uncensored adult content support.

image.label: AbyssOrangeMix3 (AOM3)
image.description: Premier SD 1.5 anime model. Excellent for fan service, ecchi, and mature anime content. Rich colors, detailed illustrations.

image.label: Counterfeit V3.0
image.description: High-quality anime model with vibrant colors. Great for detailed character art and fan service illustrations.

image.label: Anything V5 (Prt-RE)
image.description: Versatile anime model for all styles. Supports NSFW content with excellent anatomy and composition.

video.label: Stable Video Diffusion XT 1.1
video.description: Latest SVD model with 25 frames, 1024x576 resolution.

video.label: LTX-Video 2B v0.9.1 (I2V/T2V)
video.description: Lightricks LTX-Video checkpoint + T5 text encoder. Fast, lightweight - best for RTX 4080.

install.hint: After install: use LTX workflows/nodes in ComfyUI to load the checkpoint.

video.label: HunyuanVideo T2V 720p GGUF Q4_K_M Pack
video.description: GGUF UNet + required encoders + VAE. Optimized for RTX 4080 (16GB). Requires ComfyUI-GGUF nodes.

install.hint: After install: install ComfyUI-GGUF via ComfyUI Manager, restart ComfyUI, then load HunyuanVideo GGUF workflows.

video.label: Wan 2.2 5B FP16 Pack
video.description: Official Comfy-Org repack. Strong motion + modern open video. Good for RTX 4080.

install.hint: After install: use ComfyUI Wan2.2 workflows (Load Diffusion Model = wan2.2_ti2v_5B_fp16).

video.label: Mochi 1 Preview FP8 Pack
video.description: Mochi diffusion FP8 + T5XXL FP8 + Mochi VAE. Heavier model - may push 16GB VRAM limits.

install.hint: After install: update ComfyUI and use Mochi workflows. May require lowering settings on 16GB cards.

video.label: CogVideoX 1.5 5B I2V (Diffusers)
video.description: Downloads entire Diffusers-style repo. Requires ComfyUI CogVideoX wrapper. May need tuning on 16GB.

install.hint: After install: configure your CogVideoX ComfyUI wrapper to point to this diffusers folder.

edit.label: SDXL Inpainting 0.1 (Checkpoint)
edit.description: High-quality inpainting backbone for natural edits (object removal, region replace) at 1024px.

edit.label: SD 1.5 Inpainting (Fast fallback)
edit.description: Fast and stable 512px inpainting fallback. Great for low-VRAM servers.

edit.label: ControlNet SD1.5 Inpaint (Guidance)
edit.description: ControlNet inpaint guidance to preserve structure and blend edits naturally (SD1.5).

edit.label: Segment Anything (SAM ViT-H)
edit.description: Optional auto-mask helper (Segment Anything Model). Useful for background removal / object selection.

edit.label: Background Remove (U2Net ONNX)
edit.description: Optional background removal helper used by rembg-style workflows.

enhance.label: 4x UltraSharp (Upscale)
enhance.description: Sharp, clean 4x upscaler for general photos.

enhance.label: RealESRGAN x4+ (Photo)
enhance.description: Excellent photo upscaling with natural texture recovery.

enhance.label: Real-ESRGAN General x4v3
enhance.description: General-purpose Real-ESRGAN model, good for mixed content.

enhance.label: SwinIR 4x (Restore)
enhance.description: Restoration upscaler for compression and mild blur cleanup.

enhance.label: GFPGAN v1.4 (Face Restore)
enhance.description: Optional face restoration after heavy edits or upscaling.

addons.label: Video Helper Suite (VHS)
addons.description: Essential video tools: MP4/WebM export, video loading, frame manipulation. Enables proper video output instead of animated WEBP.

install.hint: Restart ComfyUI after install. Requires ffmpeg in PATH for video encoding.

addons.label: LTX-Video Nodes
addons.description: Native LTX-Video nodes for optimal performance with LTX-Video checkpoints.

addons.label: GGUF Model Loader
addons.description: Load GGUF quantized models. Required for HunyuanVideo GGUF and other quantized models.

addons.label: CogVideoX Wrapper
addons.description: Nodes to run CogVideoX Diffusers pipelines in ComfyUI.

addons.label: Impact Pack
addons.description: Essential nodes for segmentation, face detection, and advanced image workflows.

install.hint: Restart ComfyUI after install. Some features require additional model downloads.

civitai._comment: Recommended Civitai models - use version ID for download

image.label: Pony Diffusion V6 XL
image.description: The base model for character consistency and prompt adherence. Best for anime/illustration.

image.label: CyberRealistic Pony
image.description: Best blend of Pony's prompt understanding with photorealism. Excellent for realistic NSFW.

image.label: RealVisXL V5.0
image.description: The gold standard for photorealistic skin texture and lighting. SDXL-based.

image.label: Juggernaut XL
image.description: Cinematic and moody photorealism. Excellent for dramatic lighting and scenes.

image.label: Flux.1 Checkpoint (Easy to Use)
image.description: High-quality Flux checkpoint packaged for easy use with ComfyUI or Forge.

image.label: ADetailer Face Models
image.description: Face detection and enhancement models for better face quality in generations.

video.label: LTX Video (Image to Video)
video.description: Fast, lightweight video generation workflow. Best for local RTX cards (8GB+ VRAM).

video.label: Mochi 1 Video Pack
video.description: High motion fidelity video model. Excellent for smooth animations and motion.

video.label: AnimateDiff SDXL (Odinson)
video.description: Workflow to animate SDXL images using AnimateDiff. Turn still images into videos.

video.label: AnimateDiff Lightning
video.description: Fast AnimateDiff model with 4-step generation. Good for quick video previews.

chat.label: Local Model (auto-detect)
chat.description: Automatically detect and use the first available model from your vLLM/TGI server.

chat.label: GPT-4o
chat.description: Latest GPT-4 optimized model with vision capabilities.

chat.label: GPT-4o Mini
chat.description: Smaller, faster GPT-4 variant.

chat.label: GPT-4 Turbo
chat.description: GPT-4 Turbo with vision support.

chat.label: GPT-3.5 Turbo
chat.description: Fast and cost-effective GPT-3.5 model.

chat.label: Claude Opus 4.5
chat.description: Most capable Claude model with advanced reasoning.

chat.label: Claude Sonnet 4.5
chat.description: Balanced performance and speed.

chat.label: Claude Sonnet 3.5
chat.description: Previous generation Sonnet model.

chat.label: Claude Haiku 3.5
chat.description: Fast and efficient Claude model.

chat.label: Llama 3.1 70B Instruct
chat.description: IBM-hosted Llama 3.1 70B model.

chat.label: Llama 3.1 8B Instruct
chat.description: Smaller, faster Llama 3.1 variant.

chat.label: IBM Granite 13B Chat v2
chat.description: IBM's Granite model optimized for chat.

chat.label: Mixtral 8x7B Instruct
chat.description: Mistral's Mixture of Experts model.

generation_presets._comment: Curated generation presets for specific use cases. Use with compatible models.

anime_fan_service_adult.label: Anime Fan Service (Adult)
anime_fan_service_adult.description: Preset for mature anime illustrations. Optimized for ecchi and fan service content with tasteful presentation.

prompt_injection.positive_prefix: masterpiece, best quality, ultra-detailed, anime style, illustration, vibrant colors, professional lighting,
prompt_injection.positive_suffix: , highly detailed face, beautiful eyes, dynamic pose
prompt_injection.negative: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, deformed, disfigured, mutation, mutated, ugly, disgusting, out of frame, duplicate, poorly drawn face, poorly drawn hands

safety_guidelines: All depicted characters must be visibly adult (18+)
Content must remain within ecchi/fan service boundaries
No explicit sexual acts or genitalia
Focus on artistic presentation and aesthetics

anime_sfw.label: Anime (SFW)
anime_sfw.description: General-purpose anime preset for safe-for-work illustrations.

prompt_injection.positive_prefix: masterpiece, best quality, ultra-detailed, anime style, illustration,
prompt_injection.negative: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, nsfw, nude, explicit

anime_romantic.label: Anime Romantic Scene
anime_romantic.description: Preset for romantic anime scenes. Tasteful intimacy without explicit content.

prompt_injection.positive_prefix: masterpiece, best quality, ultra-detailed, anime style, romantic atmosphere, soft lighting, intimate moment,
prompt_injection.positive_suffix: , emotional, tender, beautiful composition, cinematic lighting
prompt_injection.negative: lowres, bad anatomy, bad hands, text, error, missing fingers, extra digit, fewer digits, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, deformed, ugly, explicit, pornographic, vulgar

safety_guidelines: Focus on emotional connection and romantic atmosphere
All characters must be visibly adult (18+)
